comments:

I am not sure if its related, but I also installed the xdebug plugin.

Which version of PDT are you using ? The XDebug support only works with the documented version of PDT (ie RC2). If you install it on any other version you will encounter problems.
Try removing xdebug support to see if it resolves the issue.

I am using the latest release from the update site. (20070221)
after deleting xdebug plugiun (0.1.3) the problem disappeared.
If you can, I suggest you close this bug as it isn't a bug with PDT. Sorry but XDebug doesn't support integration builds as the APIs keep changing.
